import React from 'react'; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { MdRemoveCircleOutline, MdAddCircleOutline, MdDelete } from 'react-icons/md' import * as CartActions from '../../store/modules/cart/actions' import { Container, ProductTable, Total } from './styles'; function Cart({ cart, dispatch }) { return ( PRODUTO QTD SUBTOTAL {cart.map(product => ( {product.title} {product.priceFormatted}
R$258,80 ))}
TOTAL R$1223,90
); } const mapStateProps = state => ({ cart: state.cart, }); const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => bindActionCreators(CartActions, dispatch); export default connect(mapStateProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Cart);
